rows.label: tlk70000137_03_msg0001
rows.name:
There's no end to the power
of the Grail, is there?

rows.label: tlk70000137_03_msg0002
rows.name:
It makes me afraid. Regardless of
my position as Special Inquisitor.

rows.label: tlk70000137_03_msg0003
rows.name:
At first I thought we could
take him as long as Superbia
and Iira combined forces...

rows.label: tlk70000137_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But now I think all hope is
lost without Adel-sama.
